column4: i believe in letting ubuntu do critical updates and such ..BUT.. i want my laptop to be lean and mean ... i don't need cups, bind9, etc, etc, etc ... is there some way to limit the automatic updaes to just those that are in the critical category?
are arch and gentoo laptop distros?
There is no such thing as a laptop distro..
They are slimmer distros aimed at intermediate to advanced linux users.
